dict.string: Is where programs and data are kept when the processor is actively using them.
When any program, no matter how small, occupies an entire partition.
When the total unused space of various partitions cannot be used to load the processes even though there is space available, but not in a contiguous form.
A fixed-length block of main memory.
A fixed-length block of a process.
A program in execution. A process is controlled and scheduled by the operating system.
